ksql: CREATE STREAM transaction_output WITH (PARTITIONS=1, VALUE_FORMAT='AVRO', KAFKA_TOPIC='transaction_output') AS SELECT merchant_id as "merchant_id", location_id as "location_id", terminal_id as "terminal_id", payment_scheme as "payment_scheme", transaction_type as "transaction_type", transaction_amount as "transaction_amount", TIMESTAMPTOSTRING(terminal_business_day, 'yyyy-MM-dd''T''HH:mm:ssX') as "terminal_business_day" FROM transaction_input;
